title: Wittycoin
author: Wittycoin
created_time: December 09, 2023, 02:00:54 AMLast edit: February 09, 2024, 10:42:40 PM by Wittycoin
content: The Dypius Telegram Campaign is ENDED!Participate in our Campaign and earn 2 USDT for doing tasks, up to 15 USDT for referring people. Join our campaign bot here: https://t.me/DypiusAirdropBotDYP Token is already listed on Coinmarketcap, Coinbase, KuCoin, Gate.io, MEXC, HTX, CoinGecko.Dypius has partnered with BNBChain, Avalanche, Chainlink, Conflux, Coin98, CertiK, Kyber and more projects.Note: You can also join the Zealy Campaign: https://zealy.io/c/worldofdypians/questboard or the SweepWidget Campaign: https://sweepwidget.com/c/dypius which are worth $5500 USDT in Total.Airdrop rewards will be distributed on January 8, 2024 and 1000 lucky random (1000 winners in total including referrals) participants will be rewarded. Referral Reward:Top 1: 15 USDTTop 2-10: 10 USDTTop 11-50: 6 USDTTop 51-100: 4 USDTTop 101-200: 3 USDTMore details about Dypius:Website: https://www.dypius.com/Twitter: https://x.com/dypius?t=BnD7J651GqSInqFRLuoC6g&s=09Telegram: https://t.me/dypiusDiscord: https://discord.com/invite/QrfZZzKQWorld of Dypians Special Rewards for Content CreatorsJoin the launch of the Game Account with Daily Bonus event and exclusive rewards!Content creators, your creativity deserves recognition with Special Rewards!The Special Rewards program is designed to recognize and reward players for sharing their World of Dypians gameplay content on various social media platforms, including X (Twitter), Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, Facebook, Reddit, and more.Minimum requirement of 1,000 followers on social media.The WoD Team will review the quality of the content, the engagement of the post, and other details. If you are eligible, they will determine the reward, which is distributed in BNB on a monthly basis.*Note: You can submit one post per time. The team will not reply in any form, but if you are eligible, you will see the reward in your account. The display of the rewards will occur every Monday and will be distributed monthly.To join head up here: https://www.worldofdypians.com/accountWebsite: https://www.worldofdypians.com/Twitter: https://twitter.com/worldofdypiansTelegram: https://t.me/dypiusDiscord: https://discord.com/invite/QrfZZzKQFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/worldofdypians*Replying here is not required! You can join on their telegram group or discord for assistance.
